title: Silence: Erling Kagge
description: Explorer, writer, and publisher Erling Kagge was the first person to complete the Three Poles Challenge  ⁠—  reaching the South Pole, the North Pole, and the top of Mt. Everest  ⁠—  on foot. He talks about what a life of extreme exploration has taught him about silence and the value of failure.
